Activity: Log in and review the statistics from data entry. Check emails for updates from the Data Analysts.
Attend a meeting with @Clinical Lead (clinlead-1) to discuss overall data collection goals and patient outcomes related to influenza trends.
Continue with data entry tasks, focusing on maintaining accuracy and completing any pending entries.
Engage with @Quality Assurance Tester (qatest-2) to test and verify the accuracy of newly entered data.
Send a follow-up email to @Data Analyst (da-2) regarding unresolved discrepancies in data matching efforts.
Review feedback from @Training Coordinator (trainer-1) on any training needed for improving data entry accuracy.
End-of-day summary of progress and documentation of outstanding discrepancies.
